name: Quick Maths: addition and subtraction
description:
Quick Maths is designed for high-speed counting.
You can choose from several modes

Addition - Subtraction - Addition and Subtraction
Range of digits: 10, 100, 1000, 10000

You can also include "Competition Mode"
By selecting the appropriate timer for 30 sec, 1 min, 3 min, 5 min

To see the statistics of the competitive mode, click the "Cup" button in the menu on the right.
Next, to select the leaderboard you need, change the mode, range and timer values.

Using our game, you can improve your speed and accuracy skills every day while practicing.
